data.title: B Ramp Leer
data.description: A good Leer to approach this angle though be wary of enemies holding from Back B Site as this Leer will not affect the common Operator angle.

data.title: Mid Doors Leer
data.description: A good Leer to advance through and take control of Mid Doors.

data.title: A Main to A Site Leer
data.description: This is a good Leer to throw when taking control of A Main to peek the front A Site angle.
